website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and versatile option for an exceptionally reasonable price.
pros: A streamlined design makes this easel super lightweight
Included carrying bag adds to its portability
Adjustable for either tabletop or floor
cons: No drawers or storage, but this keeps the easel lightweight

customer_reviews.title: Great portable display easel
customer_reviews.text: I am using them for displaying my canvases at art shows. They are light weight and set up easily. They grip the canvas so they are sturdy and hold good size canvases. If it is windy, I will use sandbags to keep them from falling over in the wind. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Excellwnt resource for tea her with no wall space
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom. They adjust easily and assemble quickly. They hold large chart paper. It is a great way to have a word wall with no hanging wall space!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, But Cheaply Made, Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: No instructions included, had to refer to the images on here to figure out what goes where, because it's not at all obvious. The legs aren't very stable, and don't stay locked in the spread-out position, so after using it for a bit, they fall over, because the third leg doesn't stay. The riser (the vertical part that goes up and down) is very hard to adjust, does not at all slide smoothly. The bottom cross-bar does not stay firmly attached to the poles. One of the pair arrived with a crack in it, though it doesn't affect its functionality, just demonstrates how cheaply made these are.
customer_reviews.author: Ted M. Young

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy for flower arrangements and photos
customer_reviews.text: I bought 10 total for an event. They are sturdy for flower arrangements and photos, worked like they were supposed to and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Right!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I'd thought to take a picture of the tripods in use at my daughter's engagement party. One was adjusted for table-top use to hold a 5 lb. wooden plaque that was used as a guest sign-in "book." I needed sturdiness for this as people applied slight pressure to write their names on plaque - it worked perfectly - very sturdy! The 2nd tripod adjusted to full height and held a large picture frame for people to hold up and take pictures - perfect! Once I got the hang of how to adjust them, it was easy and fast - really, genius. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy J.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of tripods!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for use at the university where I teach to hold posters. They are easy to set up and take down, hold large science project-sized poster boards securely, and can be set on the floor when legs are fully extended or on a table top with the legs partially extended. The mechanisms seem well constructed and I expect to get some years of display service out of these!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: We were going to buy cardboard stands for just about the same price and these are so much better... reusable, easy to assemble and held up our foam core boards securely. We used one at a table top height, and the other we expanded to be placed on floor level. Perfect. We have the little bags in our file cabinet, ready to go for the next event.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 4- 2pcks. We were very impressed with the quality and strength. They each have a nice small bag to store each set of two, so very easy to store and carry around. The purchase was for a Lavender Farm event, and with a little weight to keep them from moving, at the windy farm, they will be perfect for our signs to be displayed. Very impressed with the quality and pricing. We purchased a 2 pack and then purchased more and more!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: I am happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and teachers do not have much money to splurge on supplies. I searched and looked at many easels in the stores and on Amazon and selected this one based on the opinions of others. I bought this for my office at the university to put a white board, where I write motivations slogans or just use to write formulas for student to see and understand. Product performs as designed and this is definition of total quality . It is slick design and holds light white board just fine. I am happy and it is a good value for may purpose. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and small
customer_reviews.text: Overall works well. I do think the top clip could be sturdier for hanging full easel pads as I had to reverse the clip to all for the peg to got thru the pads holes rather than relying on the clip. That aside, it is easy to assemble. Folds to a small size. Works well if not being used a lot, will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Light weight doesn't mean much if it won't hold
customer_reviews.text: If you need something sturdy, look elsewhere. Not only an I constantly concerned about whether this will hold, but the stand has safety concerns as well. There are only 3 points of contact for any hanging item. The bottom two are only held on with 2 screws. The left side (facing) of the stand doesn't work for me any more. And I haven't even had it a year. I like to buy things that will last and won't add to the junk we throw away every year. This purchase just adds to the trash in the world.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I am heavily involved in my kids' wrestling association. We purchased these to use for senior night to hold up photo collages. They worked amazingly well. They were easy to assemble and the carrying cases make them very easy to store. We had them set up in a hallway with heavy foot traffic and none of them were knocked over (and I'm sure they were bumped a time or 2). I was looking at options that were almost twice as expensive - I'm so glad that we took a chance on these and plan to get a few more for use at future wrestling events.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Breakdown to a nice small package with a nice carrying case. I use them to hold my key fob displays, which weigh about 5 pounds. Indoors should be just fine. Outdoors might need to weigh down so wind doesn't blow it over.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Pinkos

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Super light and easy to carry on. My 7 years old assembled by herself and she uses for painting and drawing almost every day with any help need.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE product, do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: This is a flimsy, impossible-to-assemble product. There are no instructions, except some incomprehensible pictures with incomprehensible words (even that you have to find online). We need this for a wedding and discovered it's trash just in time to order a real easel. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: T. P. Olson

customer_reviews.title: easy set up and easy to relocate
customer_reviews.text: Very easy set up and take down, stand is very sturdy and light weight at the same time, my daughter is taking a paint class at school and uses this everyday without problems, she loves that it is so light and easy to handle, recommend to any Artist looking for a light weight reliablke stand
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Gee

customer_reviews.title: Super light and compact
customer_reviews.text: Love how light this is and the carry case is awesome. The other great feature is how adjustable the legs are so you can have it standing alone or place on a table. I plan to use these for crafting wreaths so I will update the review after I complete the first project.
customer_reviews.author: Deb P

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: the wife and I are retiring and have started painting in our down time and these easels are quick set and ready to go...............
customer_reviews.author: michaelmosgf900

customer_reviews.title: Falls down easily
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher who bought this to work at stations with second language learners. That way I would have a way to draw pictures to communicate. I would put a dry erase board on each of them. These kept falling down on their own. If a student would walk by them, a slight brush would make them fall down. These are for display in a n areas with not much traffic. The higher they get, the more unstable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Cha'kwaina

customer_reviews.title: Super light weight
customer_reviews.text: Our company use it in a trade show. It is super light weight. About 2 bl. We put it in the carry-on on board the airplane without any problem. Honestly, not sure if it's durable. But so far it works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, comes with 2, comes with cases, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these and would buy them again. They come in their own little carry cases, they are so easy to assemble, they are sturdy and durable, and they aren't heavy. I find it really makes me want to paint more now that I have a good easel. I'm thinking about giving my sister the other one since it came with 2 of them .
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R.

customer_reviews.title: surprisingly good for the money
customer_reviews.text: light weight and each in a small carrying and storage bag
customer_reviews.author: Annie in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Easy and versatile!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my honey bunny who had this to say: Comes in a great little carrying bag. It’s only 20" long which makes it easy to take where ever you go. Super easy to set up; easy to close and restore in its travel bag. Variety of heights can be set, makes it very usable in any setting. The cross bracket combined with the top clamp make it perfect for a variety of sized pads or boards. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: of no use to me
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a one-time event. Neither came with assembly directions. None of the attendees could get them to hold the posters level. The cross bar kept leaning to the extent that the posters fell off. We ended up propping the displays up on chairs. I'll donate them to the local college. Maybe they can get them to function appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: Carole W.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for display!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the light weight of the pedestals. We are hand crafter's and will use these to display our completed product (Printer drawer shadow boxes). They can handle the weight if the product without fear of tipping over. Also appreciate the compact storage for transportation. We purchased 3 at 2 each and the collapsed size with carrying case is about 4x4. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Gma in AZ.

customer_reviews.title: Used for Pictionary
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because they came as a pair. We were able to set up two large white boards (without the frames, they fell off a long time ago) and they were sturdy enough to be able to play Pictionary with them. I like that they fold down and each has their own carrying case. They are pretty light and easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: This is a stable easel.
customer_reviews.text: There isn't much to assemble. I thought the directions were confusing at first. However I figured it out. I was surprised how sturdy it is. I can honestly say I am pleased with this easel.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and put together.
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what we wanted. We used them to display family photos during a family event. Easy to use and put together. Easy to adjust the hight. Definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: harleyrrt

customer_reviews.title: No directions
customer_reviews.text: I received no directions on how to put these easels together. I have tried to figure it out a few times but have yet to use them. It's sturdy on what I did put together and seems like it will be great to use - makes me not want to use them though being I have no idea how to put it completely together.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle J Shalginewicz

customer_reviews.title: Did the job but wobbly for painting.
customer_reviews.text: Good display easel but a bit wobbly for canvas painting. Also a bit tough to keep level. Seems like it’s more of a flip-chart holder, but in the end it did the job. When extended it does take up a rather large footprint.
customer_reviews.author: colby goodman

customer_reviews.title: Would use for child art projects, not mine
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy for doing bob ross style oil painting. Covers up bottom of canvas, pain to have to lift it up to get paint all the way to bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle customr

customer_reviews.title: If weeble wobble is yer game this is the easel for you!
customer_reviews.text: Sure it's light but can't be used as an easel. It's got more weeble wobble than a teeter totter missing a nut. Will use as a display stand but not for actual work. Legs can't be locked so if you apply too much pressure it's going to take a dive
customer_reviews.author: Bryant Q. Overgard

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: The stands work fine for the price. They could be taller, at max height they are a little low for me to paint on while standing (I'm almost 6ft tall). The locking mechanism to clamp the telescoping legs open is a little weak.
customer_reviews.author: Leif

customer_reviews.title: Work in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: These aren't the highest of quality. They work, but they aren't very heavy duty. if you are looking for something cheap and easy this is them, but If you want something more robust this is not the item for you.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Todd

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Cheap and flimsy, doesn't hold the large size of paper I needed it for! If you put large paper on it, it will just fall over! I totally wasted my money on this junk! Don't buy,!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi H.

customer_reviews.title: They are not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just not very sturdy. Screws fall out the peice that holds your picture is horrible falls off easily. Just very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: jB

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an adult looking to do serious painting, probably not the easel for you. It’s not nearly y’all enough for an adult, and the top and bottom holders cover some of the canvas so you can’t paint all of it. Also the one outside will straight blow it over. And the legs don’t lock in place. Not sturdy. But for the price a great starter easel for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Easels
customer_reviews.text: Others l purchased from big box stores where unsteady and flimsy. With these l got more for the money and they are very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pinkney

customer_reviews.title: These are just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these so my granddaughter and I can paint together. It is a little awkward to lock in the canvas and getting the height right. I should have just went with the wood table top model. These will take some getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCIE

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy portable easel
customer_reviews.text: The easels were very reasonable priced and much sturdier than the ones I have been using previously. The only strike against them is the top bar does not go high enough to secure the signs I had made for display. But that doesn't appear to be an issue. It still supports the sign and are sturdy easels.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Winters

customer_reviews.title: Portable and easy to carry and set up
customer_reviews.text: I love the stands, and the fact that you get 2 of them! For me, the only downside is the little metal tray and velcro strap to secure it could be better. Since the strap goes around the rear leg of the tripod, if you make it snug and tight, it will pull in the rear leg. Other than that, I love how easy it is to set up, and it collapses down into a nice, small carry case.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should not be surprised at the quality based on the price. They are certainly functional easels, but are not as sturdy as I would have liked.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: FALSELY ADVERTISED - VERY Cheaply Made, UNRELIABLE Easels - NOT Up to OUR View of Amazon Standards
customer_reviews.text: VERY Cheaply Made! The claim on Amazon that the easels are "Reinforced Artist Easel Stand, Extra Thick Aluminum" is blatantly untrue! We would not trust these easels to carry any of our white boards! NOT up to the standard we've come to expect of Amazon! We are "VERY" Unhappy with this purchase!!! The Sutton Family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Served its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't come with any directions. So make sure that you are alert so you don't complicate its simplicity. Blew over in a very small wind on my wedding day
customer_reviews.author: master blaster

customer_reviews.title: One of the two easels work
customer_reviews.text: Well, if you get two, one will have all the right parts. Be prepared to throw one of the two in the trash. I don’t think I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: This is really junk
customer_reviews.text: is it too late to return, I bought a wooden French Easel from you for 76 USD. This was cheap & you get what you pay for. No instructions, un sturdy. I really want a refund
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I used these for my wedding and they held up some pretty heavy signs. I would definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and easy to hide when not in use. Cute tire bag too.
customer_reviews.author: S E

customer_reviews.title: these are decent
customer_reviews.text: The first ones I got both had one of the latches to lock the poles broken. I had to return them and get new ones. The new ones were better.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Haynes

customer_reviews.title: no instruction come with the product
customer_reviews.text: The items came without instructions. It is not convenient. We could not spend much time to put them together to see how they work.
customer_reviews.author: Me K

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: instructions came clear, easy to assemble, and it has a great price. Its not flimsy at all. We like the quality
customer_reviews.author: JD_Allain

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: These are flimsy, difficult to assemble, wouldn’t hold a charge tablet, and generally crap. I am returning mine. Spend the money and get a decent one. These just aren’t it.
customer_reviews.author: None of your business

customer_reviews.title: One stand came broken
customer_reviews.text: One stand came broken. When I was asked to give a review they asked me to contact the seller if I had any issues. I emailed about one stand being broken and I was redirected to amazon. Other than that the legs to bow when any weight was put on the stand. If you plan on putting a white board or anything heavier than paper beware.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Madrid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and collapse down
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my Father's in home studio. he loves them. Very easy to put together and collapse if you want to travel with them. Easily adjustable for several size prints.
customer_reviews.author: amy ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected
customer_reviews.text: We'll hold on to these for in house use--maybe. Lightweight and flimsy. They did not provide the stabiity needed to display eight posters at a small business reception. We are still in search of a sturdier set of easel for future events.
customer_reviews.author: VP

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice easels for the price. We used them to hold posters with light clips holding pictures. Held up very well and fold away nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Nurse13

customer_reviews.title: I received a used product.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this two pack and when I received the product, it already had dried acrylic paint stains all over it. I am very disappointed because I purposefully bought a new product. The tripod legs are also very unstable and do not lock, so the moment you lift it up, the legs are re-adjusting all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: Sze

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t get them to work . No instructions included. Multiple people tried.
customer_reviews.author: Ethel S.

customer_reviews.title: Easels that work!
customer_reviews.text: These easels are great! Easy to put up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Donna WhitcombFisher Associates

customer_reviews.title: easy assembly and ok for light weight frames
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, but seems too light for a heavier frame.
customer_reviews.author: Adnan J.

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy objects or windy locations
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked them to be a little sturdier. They tip easily.
customer_reviews.author: Debason

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and light weight
customer_reviews.text: It has bag and just need use small place to keep. I use it with white board, very stable and light weight, very easy to open.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is over all a great easel. Very lightweight and I am able to move wherever in the house I want to.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Knight

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Deal!
customer_reviews.text: They are good materials and work great! bought as a gift and they were well appreciated and well used.
customer_reviews.author: David Brewer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: It is as advertised, not the strongest but it gets the job done. Can’t beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: willbjeff

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: It is flimsy and missing a part. I cant get an email through to the company. I would purchase this item if I had to do it again.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Bissett

customer_reviews.title: A great  value !
customer_reviews.text: I was presently surprised about the price and the versatility of the product. A great value !!
customer_reviews.author: David Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: These aren't stable. I bought them as display easel and it was like I was trying to hold up a canvas with toothpicks. Not a fan
customer_reviews.author: KalaniP

customer_reviews.title: Easels work well.
customer_reviews.text: Easels work well. Good design. Very adjustable to accommodate different sizes and weights. Only concern is about losing pieces that are not permanently attached.
customer_reviews.author: cp

customer_reviews.title: Not at all what I expectehve at the point I can not look at the boxes any longer I purchased them f
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I expected one that I attempted to use could not sustain not pleased I would like to return these items if possible.
customer_reviews.author: jamesn

customer_reviews.title: It isn't too heavy it's not too late it holds onto your picture and it's easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: Really like this worked real well was sturdy enough but light enough to carry I like them very well they're right on target for what you need!!
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: The best easels!
customer_reviews.text: These are so nice and the storage bag included keeps them intact.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie E.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my mothers funeral photo boards. Just perfect great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Item was cheaply made. Was broke when I took out of box. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Unsturdy Item
customer_reviews.text: This item is very flimsy and unsturdy. I ordered to hold a light sign got my family reunion but was unable to use it because the legs would not stay. Do not buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Paisley Party

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: These easels are exactly what I wanted! They collapse and expand as described and are super light weight and sturdy, plus they each came with a carry bag! Great products for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Luis O. Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Mrs Dissatisfied disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Its terrible don't waste your money horrible product.... trash .. it cant hold a standard size canvas not sturdy cheap ....
customer_reviews.author: latrisha smith

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Simple
customer_reviews.text: These easels are perfect. We use them for signage at trade shows. Packs up small and holds signage securely.
customer_reviews.author: Eric L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t find the instructions right a way but easy to use
customer_reviews.author: patricia frantzen

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do and looks good doing it.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these to hold display boards. They came well packaged and were easy to assemble. They have a nice sleek look and are sturdy. We also like that they will be easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: CrossPoint Baptist Church

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Could be a little sturdier but over all a good item
customer_reviews.author: Dana Doss

customer_reviews.title: Great easels for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great easels for the price, and you get TWO! However, they are not extremely sturdy so they should only be used for artist work, not display.
customer_reviews.author: TinaMD

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.text: These were not easy to assemble & are difficult to get set up evenly. I would not recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality, Not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: One easel arrived broken so could not use at all, the other was not sturdy enough to hold a 20lb picture frame
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I loved it! Used it this past weekend for an event. It was so easy to set up (I did have to look at a video on google however) and breakdown. It comes with a cute bag!
customer_reviews.author: Claire Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed all the way
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and unstable. Not very high quality and the canvas is whobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great easels
customer_reviews.text: I use these for my photo booth signs, inexpensive enough to leave with my client!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Rines

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift, and works well
customer_reviews.text: I love the ability to adjust it, comes with bag to travel. Perfect gift
customer_reviews.author: Noelle

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Instructions are terrible though haha.. just look at the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra erickson

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the money. Good purchase for sure. These easels are useful, we used them for a memorial service, and passing them on now to a painter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right thing
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this a four because for me assembling was hard to figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Snakenberg

customer_reviews.title: Light weight!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put to put together and to travel. I had to do an even. It took three kinds tk Very durable and easy to travel with!
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA MERL

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Product works great. Lighter then expected. Very versatile, holds canvas very well... Dogs and kids bump them all the time, but they have held and stood up to the challenge...
customer_reviews.author: Johnny&Jennifer Kirkpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Good price...needs more durability
customer_reviews.text: I used the table top easels today at a market fair..a gust of wind blew one over and it broke. I was really disappointed they weren’t more durable than that. I did like that they were easy to assemble and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Too light
customer_reviews.text: Too light.. must have a hand on when doing anything!
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Perfect for indoors. Works with flip chart paper if it has a backing. Could be used outside but would need to be secured to something else.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia A Berley

customer_reviews.title: IT'S EXACTLY WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THAT THIS IS EASY TO SET UP, DURABLE AND PORTABLE AND I GET TWO!!! THEY BOTH WORK GREAT. THANKS:D
customer_reviews.author: SunFlower

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a nice carrying case, easy to assemble, great price. This works great with different size canvases, easy to use on a tabletop.
customer_reviews.author: Angel97999

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! can be used as multiple heights, and store nicely in the the carrying cases.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Raffaele

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. The instructions were a little vague but I got it eventually. Its pretty sturdy and holds up canvases well. Can get a little wobbly if you don’t tighten it up enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine_AC17

product_meta.title: T-SIGN 66 Inches Reinforced Artist Easel Stand, Extra Thick Aluminum Metal Tripod Display Easel 21 to 66 Inches Adjustable Height with Portable Bag for Floor/Table-Top Drawing and Displaying, 2 Pack
product_meta.description:
T-SIGN Reinforced Aluminum Extra Sturdy 66 Inches Tall Adjustable Height Easel Stand

This T-SIGN 66" Tall Lightweight Aluminum Field Easel is made of high-quality lightweight aluminum alloy, which is really tough and sturdy. The height can be adjusted from 21" to 66", which is best display easel for dry erase marker board, whiteboard, chalkboard, posters, paintings. Will hold a large pad of paper, Artists can use it in the studio, as a tabletop painting easel, outdoor in the field, or to display art, canvas paintings, pictionary, etc.

Specifications:
-Material: Aluminum Alloy 
-Product Weight: 3.1 lbs 
-Package Dimensions: 25.5 x 8.8 x 3.7 inches

Assembly: 
Please Refer to the Installation Instructions in the Fifth Product Image of the Commodity Page

Package Includes: 
-2 x Easel 
-1 x silver Fixing Bar 
-1 x black Nylon Bag

Customer Service:
Please read the product instructions carefully, in the event of difficulties, do not hesitate to contact us.
Our Goal is to Serve You until Get Your Satisfaction

About T-SIGN
T-SIGN is a professional manufacturer of high-quality sign stand, We have twenty years of experience in this industry, produced hundreds of thousands of stand products every month, from poster stands, banner stands, magazine stands, backdrop stands and X display, etc. Each of our products is carefully manufactured and rigorously tested before selling. T-SIGN wants to keep bringing best quality stands to customers all over the world! Not just talking about it, we'll stick to it!
feature_bullets: Height & Angle: 21" to 66" - Perfect for floor stand or tabletop display, Folds to only 21" for easy storage and transporting, Easy turn knobs for quick height/angle adjustments
Canvas Size: Accommodates panels or canvases up to 33"h x 1.2"d and can hold up to 25 lbs, Spring Loaded Top Clamp secures canvases in place
Suitable For Different Ground: Adjustable legs are perfect for field use to adjust to uneven ground, Non-slip base provides more grip performance, easy carry with a durable carry bag in the outdoor
Reinforce Design: Good wind resistance, T-Sign Easel stand made of extra thick lightweight aluminum metal to be more stable, A free carry bag (with shoulder strap) for easy transporting

T-SIGN Professional After-Sale: In the process of receiving or using the product, if you encounter any problems, please feel free to contact us. T-SIGN always pays attention to the quality of products.
